Sentencas: The main purpose of the current research work is to suggest a novel integrated multi-generation energy system and scrutinize 4E evaluation.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: This system consists of a solid oxide fuel cell, a PEM electrolyzer for hydrogen production, and an ejector-based absorption chiller for the coefficient of performance improvement.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: All parts of this system are verified with existing reports and papers.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: Effect of fuel cell current density, SOFC fuel cell temperature, absorption chiller evaporator temperature, and condenser temperature, and outlet turbine pressure has been investigated and reported.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: The effect of mentioned parameters on the exergy and cost rate has been considered.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: Data illustrate that the maximum exergy destruction rate belongs to the SOFC contributing 60% of the total exergy destruction rate of the system.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: Under the given condition of the system, the net produced power is about 200 kW with an exergy efficiency of 30.2% and thermal efficiency of 60.4%.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: At the considered condition the total cost rate of the system is estimated about 22.29 $/hr.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system

Sentencas: The results of the present work provide a scientific base for designing poly-generation systems with high efficiency and reasonable cost rate.
Titulo: Exergy and exergo-economic investigation of a novel hydrogen production and storage system via an integrated energy system
